FuncDef: This command associates a Quality of Service (QoS) policy with an egress Service Access Point (SAP).

ParaDef.Info: The egress policy ID to associate with SAP on egress. The policy ID must already exist. Values-1 to 65535.

Specifies the name of the egress port queue group of the IOM/IMM/XMA, up to 32 characters in length. The queue-group-name must correspond to a valid egress queue group, created under config>port>ethernet>access>egress.
Specifies the instance of the named egress port queue group on the IOM/IMM/XMA. Values-1 to 40960. ParamDefault: Default- 1
